sentences.en: French conductor and composer of atonal , avant - garde works, notably Le Marteau sans Ma ? re ( 1955 ).
sentences.cn: 布莱兹,皮尔生于1925法国指挥家和作曲家, 创有无调的前卫派音乐作品, 有名的如无主的琴槌 ( 1955年 )

sentences.en: He has used aggressive tactics to popularize atonal music, even joining a symphony that specializes in the music of Shoenberg.
sentences.cn: 他利用积极手段普及无调音乐，甚至加入专门演奏舒恩伯格音乐的交响乐团。

sentences.en: People did not accept atonal music at that time.
sentences.cn: 那时,人们还不接受无调性音乐.

sentences.en: Some critics propose that atonal music is synonymous with chaos, but Reyna believes the growth of such music is a symptom of a healthy artistic world.
sentences.cn: 有些评论家认为无调音乐等同于混乱，但莱纳认为这种音乐的发展是一个健康艺术世界的迹象。

sentences.en: The majority always turn an unfavorable attitude towards atonal composition.
sentences.cn: 大多数人对无调性作品的态度往往是不能接受的.

sentences.en: There is great atonal music and terrible atonal music.
sentences.cn: 无调性音乐中既有宏伟动人之作,又有糟得吓人之作.

sentences.en: We are trying to follow some general intern atonal practice.
sentences.cn: 我们在尝试按国际惯例办事.

trans.tran_en: a piece of music that is atonal is not based on a particular  key 2 4
